#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

Updating Eurocarb database

= How to run =
1.Download Eurocarb project and follow the instruction below.

http://code.google.com/p/eurocarb/wiki/StableBuild

2.Go to GlycomeDB folder and edit build.xml to current user setting.
  Initial setting is below for an example. 

  //currentDir is where GlycomeDB folder is located.
  <property name="currentDir" location="/home/kitaemyoung/workspace/GlycomeDB"/>
  //bin is where GlycomeDB/bin is located.
  <property name="bin" location="/home/kitaemyoung/workspace/GlycomeDB/bin"/>
  //external-lib is where eurocarb/exterbal-lib/java is located.
  <property name="external-lib" location="/home/kitaemyoung/eurocarb/external-libs/java"/>
  //eurocarb-lib is where eurocarb/lib is located.
  <property name="eurocarb-lib" location="/home/kitaemyoung/eurocarb/lib"/>

3.Need to change property.ini file.
   //user name for database
   
   DBuser=GlycomeDBBot

   //user full name for database
   
   DBuserFullName=Automatic script to fill database with crossreferences
   
   //user Email address
   
   DBuserEmailAddress=123@gmail.com
   
   //URL for downloading xml file
   
   DBurl=http://www.glycome-db.org/http-services/getStructureDump.action?user=eurocarbdb
   
   //current folder where GlycomeDB is located
   
   CurrentFolder=/home/kitaemyoung/workspace/GlycomeDB/
   
   //xml file name for DBurl
   
   outXMLFilename=glycomedb.xml
 

4.Type "ant run"
